name: Dice To Meet You
description:
Play as Mr. Dice, as you you try to get to the end of the level before time runs out. Roll yourself to randomly swap between one of six different abilities as you make your way through enemies and platforming sections.

(This was made in 50 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2022. The theme was "Roll of the Dice".)

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move/Jump

Z/ENTER - Use Ability/Confirm

X/R - Re-roll Ability/Go Back
